name: Civilization Revolution
summary: Legendary game designer Sid Meier brings the greatest strategy game of all time to console! Built from the ground up for the console, Sid Meier's Civilization Revolution challenges you to lead your chosen nation from the dawn of man to the space age on your quest to rule the world. Go head to head with history's greatest leaders as you wage war, conduct diplomacy, discover new technologies and build the most powerful empire the world has ever known. The famously addictive gameplay, endless ways to play and online multiplayer competitions, matchmaking, Leaderboards, Achievements and downloadable content will keep you coming back for more.
